  • Method Details

    • loadProducts

      public void loadProducts()
      Load products and insert to table.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL arg0, ResourceBundle arg1)
      Initializes the screen. Set all data relevant to Inventory report. Inventory report based on specific machine ID. It shows all products in that machine and more information such as stock amounts, type of products, total worth of stock.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      arg0 - the location of the root object
      arg1 - the resources used to localize the root object
